In warmer environments, they become somewhat fatigued, making them easier to catch.|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Snow Finch''' is a type of finch which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].
